Description: A unique ID for each site consisting of letter(s) followed by a number*
A unique combination of bulk_type, site_id, and replicate
Facility where sample was sent for molecular/metagenomic analysis
The kind of sequencer that was used: Nova-seq, PacBio Revio etc.
Concentration of DNA as measured by Qubit instrument, in nanograms per microliter
The number of reads resulting from the sequencing
Name of the sequencing file received from the sequencing facility
